_description: Be Humble and Shrive Thee Oft — three couplets

NLS18721.Transcription:
Be lou & louendeBe meke & murnendeÞenk eyȝe
                    and lok loweBe seldum sowen and litel knoweOften scrif þe
                    & go clene& þan salt han blisse withouten wene
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 18.
